org.apache.polygene.api.serialization

Interface Serialization.Format

  • Enclosing interface:
    Serialization

    public static interface Serialization.Format
    Serialization format @Service tags. Serialization implementations should be tagged with theses at assembly time so that consumers can specify which format they need.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String JSON
      Tag a Serialization service that support the JSON format.
      static String XML
      Tag a Serialization service that support the XML format.
      static String YAML
      Tag a Serialization service that support the YAML format.
